value:
A charm that belonged to Palla. She
made it herself on the day she left for
Valentia. A symbol of sisterly reunion.

A charm that belonged to Palla. She
made it herself with feathers from her
and her sister's pegasi.

A bandana of Luthier's. It appears
to be considered formal to those who
have studied magic in Valentia.

key: MDAID_魔道士のバンダナ・極
MDAID_H_魔道士のバンダナ・極
value:
A bandana of Luthier's. It appears
to be considered formal in Valentia,
and the red gems are a nice touch.

A tiara that belonged to Tatiana. Made
with fine gold chains, it is of a style
commonly worn by saints in Valentia.

key: MDAID_聖女のサークレット・極
MDAID_H_聖女のサークレット・極
value:
A tiara that belonged to Tatiana. The
flowing cloth embellishments add an
undeniable aura of cuteness.

A magnificent helmet from Zeke. Given
to him by the Rigelian army, it appears
he ultimately never wore it.

A truly magnificent helmet from Zeke.
From the Emperor of Rigel, it has been
on display and still has yet to be worn.

key: MDAID_プラチナの盤上トロフィー
MDAID_H_プラチナの盤上トロフィー
value:
Proof of incredible results
in Pawns of Loki.

Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Defeat a green foe with a red ally.

Defeat axe foes that are level 10 or higher with
red-type allies.

Defeat a green tome foe that is level 20
or higher with a red ally.

Defeat a red foe that is level 10 or higher
with a red ally.

Defeat a sword foe that is level 20 or higher
with a red ally.

Defeat a red tome foe that is level 30 or higher
with a red ally.

Defeat a blue foe that is level 10 or higher
with a red ally.

with a red ally.

Defeat a blue tome foe that is level 30
or higher with a red ally.

Defeat a staff foe that is level 30 or higher
with a red ally.

Defeat a colorless bow foe that is level 30
or higher with a red ally.

Defeat a colorless dagger foe that is level 30
or higher with a red ally.

Pegasus knight from Macedon who ventured
to Valentia in pursuit of her sister. Appears in
Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

A mage and eccentric man of Zofia who excels
in magic but has no friends. Appears in Fire
Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Cleric of the Rigelian Empire who tends toward
thoughtlessness, but she's also very generous
and loves Zeke deeply. Appears in Fire Emblem
Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

General of the Rigelian Empire. Tatiana found
him unconscious, his memory lost. Appears in
Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

A noble of Zofia and part of the Deliverance
until leaving to serve under Berkut. Appears in
Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

The crown princess of Jötunheimr and twin
sister of Dagr. Appreciates the finer things
in life, prizing beauty and elegance.

Seiðjárn-powered mounted soldier with a sword.
Moves far, but can't enter forests.

Seiðjárn-powered mounted soldier with a lance.
Moves far, but can't enter forests.

Seiðjárn-powered mounted soldier with an axe.
Moves far, but can't enter forests.

Mythic Effect: Dark
Boost: HP+5, Def+5

Grants allies this Mythic Effect during Dark
season, if the Dark blessing has been conferred
and if this unit enters battle in Aether Raids with
them: Dark-blessed allies decrease the
Aetheric Lift lost for defense failures during
Dark season. (This decrease is limited to the
number of Mythic Heroes (Max: 2) × the number
of Heroes with the blessing conferred × 5.)

During Dark season, this Mythic Hero will
decrease Aetheric Lift loss for defense
failures depending on number of merges. (This
decrease is limited to the number of times the
units have been merged × 1 (Max: 20).)

Mythic Effect 2: Dark
Boost: Defensive Team Bonus
(Details can be found in Edit Defensive Team.)

Uses a spear to assist and amplify her
own bonuses! Equipped with Distant
Counter too, she's built to crush foes.

She can move two more spaces after
acting—and she attacks twice, striking
the lower of her foe's Def or Res!

His weapon has Distant Counter and
can get guaranteed follow-ups—he
withstands attacks and strikes back.

On attacking, he can reduce foe stats
by 4 during combat! As a 4★ unit, it's
easier to add him to your army too.

$aEnables【Canto (２)】.

Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice. (Even if foe
initiates combat, unit attacks twice.) Calculates
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

【Canto (２)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move ２ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger again. Unit's base movement has no
effect on movement granted. Cannot warp
(using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance
greater than ２ space(s).)

Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, unit makes
a guaranteed follow-up attack.

During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

If unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.

If unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.

Grants HP+5, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. If unit is 5★,
level 40, a Legendary Hero or a Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 175, treats unit's
stats as 175 in modes like Arena. If unit is 5★,
level 40, not a Legendary Hero or Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 180, treats unit's
stats as 180 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat
total calculation excludes any values added by
merges and skills.)

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts
Atk/Spd-5 on foe during combat, and also,
if unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%).

At start of turn, inflicts Def/Res-3 on foes within
2 spaces of unit through their next actions.

At start of turn, inflicts Def/Res-4 on foes within
2 spaces of unit through their next actions.

At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of
a foe, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on closest foes through
their next actions and grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit
for 1 turn.

At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of
a foe, inflicts Def/Res-6 on closest foes through
their next actions and grants Def/Res+6 to unit
for 1 turn.

$aEnables【Canto (Rem.)】.

【Canto (Rem.)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move spaces = any
movement not already used that turn.
(If unit used a movement skill that warped
them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger again. Unit's base movement has no
effect on movement granted. Cannot warp
(using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance
greater than unit's remaining movement.)

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of
an ally, grants Spd+5 to unit during combat
and deals damage = 15% of unit's Spd.

$aEffective against flying foes. Grants Spd+3.
At the start of turns 2 and 3, deals 7 damage
to foes within 3 columns centered on unit and
inflicts【Panic】on those foes.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

$aAccelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit initiates combat, grants Def+20 to unit
during combat, and also, if foe can counter,
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on target and foes
within 2 spaces of target through their
next actions, and grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5
to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.

Grants Res+3. At start of turn, if any foes have
the highest Atk or Res on the enemy team,
inflicts -7 on those foes' corresponding stat
through their next actions. At start of combat,
if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Spd/Res+4
during combat.

At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat and neutralizes
effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks
and effects that prevent unit's follow-up
attacks during combat.

If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces
of an ally, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe and inflicts
Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack
during combat. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd+4 during combat, and also, after
combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Special
cooldown count+1 on target and foes within
2 spaces of target (no effect on Special
cooldown counts already at maximum) and
grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit and
allies within 2 spaces of unit.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 to unit during combat, and also,
after combat, if unit attacked, deals 7 damage
to target and foes within 2 spaces of target.

At start of turn, restores 7 HP to unit and allies
within 2 spaces of unit.

If unit initiates combat, or if unit is within
2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Res+4
to unit during combat.
